charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1101_0100:
It was a fine day for adventuring, and Serena and
[Name:PlayerNickname ] set out to do just that.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1101_0200:
When they reached the field, they decided it was
time for a breather.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_0300:
Feel that refreshing breeze? It reminds me of the
wind on the day we first set out from home.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0401_0500:
I mean the day Calem, Shauna, and I first left
Vaniville Town together.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0402_0700:
Right—Calem, Shauna, and I all set out from
Vaniville Town together that day.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_0800:
Then when we got to Aquacorde Town, we met
these two other Trainers, Tierno and Trevor...
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_0900: and that’s how our journey began!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_1000:
I sure have come a long way since that day, now
that I think about it.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_1100:
But I’ve never lost the flutter of excitement in
my heart!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_1200:
I think that’s because I’m still ready to dive into a
new world of adventure at any moment.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0401_1500: Yes, I’m fine. I appreciate the concern, though.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0402_1700:
Haha, you’ve got that right! But this wouldn’t be
much of an adventure without a few headwinds.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_1900:
Oh, I see...because of that gust just now?
Give me just a second.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_2100: Fennekin told me the wind messed up my hair.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_2200:
He noticed how I’m always taking care of
my appearance...
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_2300:
so now he’s started telling me when I’m making a
fashion faux pas.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_2400:
Thanks, Fennekin. Here, have a nice twig to
chew on.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_2500: Hope it’s a tasty one. Thanks for having my back.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_2600: Sorry to derail the conversation like that!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_2700:
What I was trying to say was, there’s something I
realized during our journey through Kalos.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_2800:
The fact that we all had different skills was what
let me and my friends help one another out.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_2900:
Take Tierno—he’s got some serious dance moves.
Then there’s Trevor, who never misses a single
question on his tests.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_3000:
Shauna’s always kind and radiates cuteness, and
Calem taught me a lot about being a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_3100:
I wonder what it’d be like to have a Pasio-style
three-on-three battle with all of them...
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_3200:
I have a feeling it’d be as unique and interesting
as all the people taking part in it. I can’t even
imagine what that’d look like!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0301_3300: Sounds like they’ve all got character!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0401_3400:
Yes—they’re all true to themselves. I really
respect that!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0302_3500: Sounds like they all shine bright!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0402_3600:
Yes—they all give their best effort. I really
respect that!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_3700:
I’ve gotten to meet a lot of people through
my travels.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_3800:
There’s Korrina, Clemont, Valerie, Siebold, and
Wikstrom...and that’s just a few off the top of
my head!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_3900:
The Champion, Diantha, left a particularly
big impression on me.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_4000:
She said something that really stuck with me:
“Youth may be beautiful, but it’s not all there is to
life. Everything changes.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_4100:
"I want to live and change like that, too. So I look
forward to playing different roles as I get older."
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_4200:
Hearing that made me determined to keep on
being my unique self and shining bright as I
get older.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_4300:
I’m gonna hold on to the spark of excitement and
take my fashion game to the limit!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_4400:
And in order to do that, I’m going to keep on
traveling and meeting all kinds of people!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0301_4500: I’ll cheer you on the whole way!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0401_4600: Aw, thanks! That’s so nice to hear!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0302_4700: I think you’ve got the right idea!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_0402_4800: Aw, thanks! That’s so nice to hear!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_4900:
Looks like Fennekin’s about done with his twig.
Should we get moving?
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2301_1201_5000:
I can’t wait to find out what sync pairs we’re
gonna meet today!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2311_1201_0100:
Lumiose City over in Kalos has such a stylish
look to it! Especially the Prism Tower...
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2311_1201_0200:
Something tells me that what really interests you
about the Prism Tower is its Gym...
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2311_1201_0300:
You saw right through me! I do love fashion, 
but I love a good Pokémon battle, too!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2311_1201_0400: In that case, why don’t you and I have a battle?
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2311_0101_0100: Absolutely! I was hoping we’d get the chance!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2311_0501_0100:
That was a great battle! Thanks, Serena.
You too, Fennekin!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2311_0501_0400:
Oh, I get it! You’re evolving!
You’re amazing, Fennekin!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2312_1201_0100:
E-excuse me, Elesa? My name’s Serena! I’m a
huge fan of yours!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2312_1201_0200:
Hmm...judging by your fashion sense, would you
happen to be from Kalos?
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2312_1201_0300: You got it! Kalosian, born and raised!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2312_1201_0400:
Your style is just the greatest—on both the runway
and the battlefield!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2312_1201_0500:
Why, thanks! But you know, there’s no better way
for you to show me what you mean than in battle.
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2312_0101_0100: So let me see you go all out!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2312_0501_0100:
You two fought so wonderfully, it almost made
me dizzy!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2312_0501_0200: You hear that, Braixen? Elesa complimented us!
charaepi_ch0130_00_serena/2312_0501_0400:
Oh, you’re evolving! That’s amazing!
Let’s keep doing our best together!
